column4: so again :-P does anyone know what's the fancy X lock thingie in hoary?   (I'm upgrading from warty but I didn't get that one for some reason)
I upgraded xscreensaver and it looks a bit better, but it's not the same thing my colleague has on his hoary
why not just change the screensaver then?
I'm not talking about the screensaver itself, but the "unlock" dialog
